survey_brief: This survey aims to understand employee satisfaction and effectiveness with remote collaboration tools used in the workplace.

questions.question_text: Which remote collaboration tools do you use regularly for work?
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow selection of multiple tools.

script.question_text: Which remote collaboration tools do you use regularly for work?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the remote collaboration tools provided by your company?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the remote collaboration tools provided by your company?

questions.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face when using remote collaboration tools?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format with an 'Other' option for additional input.

script.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face when using remote collaboration tools?

questions.question_text: How often do you experience technical difficulties with remote collaboration tools?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale for measurement.

script.question_text: How often do you experience technical difficulties with remote collaboration tools?

questions.question_text: What additional features would improve your experience with remote collaboration tools?
questions.client_notes: Allow open-ended responses to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What additional features would improve your experience with remote collaboration tools?

questions.question_text: How many hours per day do you spend using remote collaboration tools?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format for time ranges.

script.question_text: How many hours per day do you spend using remote collaboration tools?

questions.question_text: Do you feel that remote collaboration tools help you stay connected with your team?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format for clarity.

script.question_text: Do you feel that remote collaboration tools help you stay connected with your team?

questions.question_text: What type of training or support would help you use remote collaboration tools more effectively?
questions.client_notes: Allow open-ended responses to gather specific suggestions.

script.question_text: What type of training or support would help you use remote collaboration tools more effectively?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your current remote collaboration tools to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for likelihood measurement.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your current remote collaboration tools to a colleague?

questions.question_text: What is one thing you would change about your current remote collaboration tools?
questions.client_notes: Allow open-ended responses to gather actionable feedback.

script.question_text: What is one thing you would change about your current remote collaboration tools?
